item.title: Playnite 10.44 – Nouvelle mise à jour
item.description:
The version Playnite 10.44 is now available. Here are all the official fixes and improvements:

  • Fully manually added games no longer default to installed state
  • Random game picker via F6 doesn't work in Fullscreen mode
  • Playnite doesn't open in Fullscreen mode when auto data backups are enabled
  • Improved manual update check process
  • Playnite not working properly when FIPS enforcement policy is enabled (by Rast1234)
  • Increased maximum of selectable columns and rows in Fullscreen mode
  • Library update is skipped when making or restoring backup
  • Default interface language is not selected properly (by CanRanBan)

Recommended update for all users.
